translations: v.降临；发生; befall 的过去分词；落到

phrs.translation: 发生, 比福伦, 荒废神庙, 降临

sentences.sentence: He said to his wife, "what ill luck has befallen me!"
Come, tell me all the good fortune that has befallen you.
sentences.translation: 来，快告诉我你交了什么好运了？

sentences.sentence: They might stand together if the danger of life had befallen them.
sentences.translation: 如果有性命之忧，他们也许就能团结起来了。
